document.full_text: ardent british rock fan dmitry medvedev got his wish on tuesday night when the russian president hosted deep purple at his luxurious residence near moscow, the kremlin said.
document.title: russia's medvedev hosts his idols deep purple
lines_and_colors: ardent british rock fan dmitry medvedev got his wish on tuesday night when the russian president hosted deep purple at his luxurious residence near moscow, the kremlin said.
